summary: Fun mod I made using creation kit for first time. Basically an OP Daedric Sword available from very early on in the game!
descriptionHtml:
This is my first ever user created mod. It is basically am OP Daedric Sword with an absorb health enchantment on it. It is craft-able at any forge and needs the perk Daedric smiting for ability to craft it. You will need 3 Leather strips & 2 Iron ingot to create and 2 steel ingots and the arcane smithing perk to temper.
This is a fun mod as I was just messing around with the creation kit for the first time. If I can, I will try to make some more serious mods in the future if this one does alright. Enjoy :)
Would recommend getting the SeeEnchantments mod as well for weapon to look like image. You can get it here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38839/?
author: Elixirgames
